name: Bad Larry
description:
Well, well, well. You've just committed another petty crime and you're off and running as fast as you can. See how long you can run without getting caught as Bad Larry while collecting coins to buy new jackets and tunes along the way.

Features:

- simple tap, double tap, triple tap game play
- non-stop side scrolling action
- in game store for customization of game character
- stylish sound tracks
- optimized for iOS 7
- designed for game play on iPhone 4S, 5C, 5S, 6, and 6+, 6s, and 6s+
